title: player banned
body:
I even don't know what i did.  I just played in this afternoon. and i want to play in night. player banned. This account suspended???
what's the reason?

replies.body: Looks like this account was suspended due to it being compromised. Hit us up in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) by picking the option "I need help recovering my account" and after you verify yourself as the creator of the account they'll be able to help out.
I also didnt receive any email
